services.summary: Environmental data monitoring, sustainability reporting, carbon footprint analysis

offered.name: Environmental Monitoring
offered.description: Continuous sensor-based monitoring of air quality, water discharge, noise levels, and emissions at client facilities.

offered.name: Sustainability Reporting

notOffered: Environmental legal consulting or regulatory advocacy

suggestWhen: Users ask for environmental monitoring services in the Pacific Northwest

doNotSuggestWhen: Users need environmental legal advice or regulatory consulting
Users want to buy or sell carbon credits
Users are located outside Oregon, Washington, and Northern California
